name.en: Fundamental Theory and Engineering Application of Machine Vision

goal.en: As a student, you will be instructed in the principles and applications of image processing, pattern recognition, and computer vision. The curriculum is designed to impart a thorough understanding of image-related methods through hands-on exercises, aimed at fostering your competency in industrial research and development.
goal.ch: 學生在此門課將學習到各種影像處理技術，並以實做為基礎，開發各種影像處理系統，以應付未來職場的需要。

content.en:
Introduction to Image Processing
Introduction to Image Operations
Image Processing in Spatial Domain
Image Processing in Frequency Domain
Image Segmentation
Image Restoration
Color Image Processing
Image Compression
Project Presentation
content.ch:
1.影像處理簡介
2.影像操作
3.空間域影像處理
4.頻率域影像處理
5.影像還原
6.影像分割
7.彩色影像處理
8.影像壓縮簡介
9.專題報告
